properties.body:
1. NORTH AMERICAN ICE SERVICE (NAIS)
   ICEBERG BULLETIN 070001Z JUN.
2. WARNING! THE INTERNATIONAL ICE PATROL
   IS EXPERIENCING REDUCED ICEBERG
   RECONNAISSANCE. ALL ICEBERG LIMITS
   REPORTED BELOW ARE ESTIMATED.
   PLEASE NAVIGATE WITH CAUTION.
3. ICEBERG LIMIT ALONG TRACKLINE JOINING
   46-51N 054-08W, 45-45N 052-35W,
   46-00N 050-35W, 48-40N 046-50W,
   52-30N 048-50W, 57-05N 052-15W.
4. ESTIMATED ICEBERG LIMIT ALONG
   TRACKLINE JOINING
   57-05N 052-15W, 56-45N 044-40W,
   57-45N 041-55W, 62-50N 037-45W,
   65-05N 030-30W.
5. WESTERN ICEBERG LIMIT ALONG TRACKLINE
   JOINING
   50-14N 061-43W, 48-35N 059-10W.
6. SEA ICE LIMIT ALONG TRACKLINES
   JOINING:
   A. 53-14N 055-47W, 54-52N 054-51W,
      57-27N 059-27W, 58-02N 059-32W,
      62-00N 059-18W, 62-57N 057-45W.
   B. 62-25N 040-31W, 61-38N 041-00W,
      59-51N 043-13W, 59-40N 044-11W,
      59-49N 045-43W, 59-56N 045-33W,
      59-59N 044-46W.
7. MOST RECENT RECONNAISSANCE:
   WESTERN LIMIT ICEBERG FLIGHT 02 JUN 22.
8. REPORT POSITION AND TIME OF ANY ICEBERGS
   SEA ICE OR STATIONARY RADAR TARGETS THAT
   MAY LIKELY BE ICE TO THE NEAREST CANADIAN
   COAST GUARD MARINE COMMUNICATIONS AND
   TRAFFIC SERVICE STATION OR
   USING INMARSAT CODE 42.
9. FOR MORE REPORTING INFORMATION OR TO
   DOWNLOAD SHAPEFILES AND WEEKLY PREDICTIONS,
   GO TO WWW.NAVCEN.USCG.GOV/IIP.
10. CANCEL THIS MSG 080001Z JUN 22.
